name: Waves
description: 'Waves' is a starter pack with the essentials for creating Future Bass or other Electronic genres. It includes 70 premium quality samples, all for free.

name: Textures
description: 'Textures' is an ambiance and atmosphere toolkit full of flowing pads, unique granular loops, field recordings, foley, and more. These tools are great for filling in space, setting an atmosphere, or creating unique layers to add interest to any track!
